files.content:
import {
  Select,
  SelectItem,
  SelectSection,
} from "@/registry/new-york-v4/ui/select"

export default function SelectAiModels() {
  return (
    <Select
      label="AI Model"
      placeholder="Select a model"
      className="w-[280px]"
      description="Choose the AI model for your task"
    >
      <SelectSection title="OpenAI">
        <SelectItem id="gpt-4-turbo">GPT-4 Turbo</SelectItem>
        <SelectItem id="gpt-4">GPT-4</SelectItem>
        <SelectItem id="gpt-3.5-turbo">GPT-3.5 Turbo</SelectItem>
      </SelectSection>
      <SelectSection title="Anthropic">
        <SelectItem id="claude-3-opus">Claude 3 Opus</SelectItem>
        <SelectItem id="claude-3-sonnet">Claude 3 Sonnet</SelectItem>
        <SelectItem id="claude-3-haiku">Claude 3 Haiku</SelectItem>
      </SelectSection>
      <SelectSection title="Google">
        <SelectItem id="gemini-pro">Gemini Pro</SelectItem>
        <SelectItem id="gemini-pro-vision">Gemini Pro Vision</SelectItem>
      </SelectSection>
      <SelectSection title="Meta">
        <SelectItem id="llama-2-70b">Llama 2 70B</SelectItem>
        <SelectItem id="llama-2-13b">Llama 2 13B</SelectItem>
      </SelectSection>
    </Select>
  )
}
